titleStmt.title: A necessary advertisement to a needfull fortification My former tables much good liking won, the fate of this, may in the like line run: with trading times, they suited; and (I guess) this with our sad condition suits no lesse. / By Wil: Webster.
titleStmt.author: Webster, William, fl. 1625-1634.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "As novv vve busily our selves apply,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
